location: Willow Support House, 16 Alder Court, Campbelltown NSW
description: Participant became verbally aggressive when informed of a change in weekend plans. He shouted at staff, knocked over a chair, and used threatening language without physical contact.

location: CareLink Apartments, 22 Birch Grove, Liverpool NSW
description: Participant tripped over a loose floor mat in the living area, fell to her knees, and reported mild pain. First aid was administered and a nurse confirmed no bruising.

location: Sunhaven House, 89 Kingfisher Street, Penrith NSW
description: Participant exited through an unsecured gate during a shift change. She was found 12 minutes later at a nearby bus stop, calm but distressed about cancelled outing.

location: ActiveBridge Apartments, 4 Regent Lane, Castle Hill NSW
description: Participant refused morning medication citing stomach discomfort, became withdrawn and later verbally aggressive. Calmed after isolation and monitoring.

location: HopePathways Residence, 3/18 Forest Glen Rd, Wagga Wagga NSW
description: Participant accidentally knocked over a kettle, causing it to break. He became anxious due to noise; no injuries occurred.

location: RisingCare House, 45 Ash Tree Ave, Mount Druitt NSW
description: Participant was observed scratching his arms repeatedly. Staff redirected him to a low‑sensory space and applied a cool compress.

location: LivingBright House, 92 Coral St, Hornsby NSW
description: Participant was left behind due to staff reading the roster incorrectly. She was upset and spent the morning in her room.

location: Pathfinder Support Home, 33 Banksia Blvd, Goulburn NSW
description: Participant had a verbal argument with a co‑resident over TV preferences. No physical contact; both were calmly separated.
